Well, I haven't posted in quite a while...

Bad Girl.

Oh, well.
http://lady-epona.livejournal.com/6321.html

I cannot believe it...

I slept through my alarm clock this morning. 

Is that possible?

I lost the first 2 periods of school, which I would usually say is a good thing, but it's not. 

I need a new alarm clock..
http://lady-epona.livejournal.com/6128.html

Huh...

My Aunt/Uncle/Cousin just came over to visit...

I got kicked out of my room and I spent my Saturday cleaning...

It's great...

That's sarcasm, by the way. Does anybody feel in the slightest bit sorry for me?
http://lady-epona.livejournal.com/5874.html

I had so many Tests today...3 and one cancelled one. Figures they cancel the one I studied for. 

Well, whatever. 

I hopefully aced at least 2 of them. I think in Social Studies I got a B... 

So that was my boring Friday so far. Did you know that your foot is the exact space between your elbow and wrist? 

And my little 'fun fact' for the day...

I hate school. I love my friends. It's not fair.
http://lady-epona.livejournal.com/5054.html

HAPPY VALENTINE'S DAY!!

Though I am so, so S.A.D. (Singleton's Awareness Day)

SOB

Hey, at least I got cupcakes. And I love Izzy and Caitlin, because y'all are the only ones who'll read this journal. 

I'm gonna go find some Candy...
http://lady-epona.livejournal.com/4862.html

I'm bored, I don't want to go to sleep because I'll wake up tomorrow (that's the good part) and have to go to school (that's the bad part). At least I get to sleep in an hour because of the new SCHEDRULE. Actually it's our old schedrule...the schedrule we're suppose to have...but no, we woke up at 6:30 am for the last 1/2 school year. At least I did. Half the school was just late. They were the smart ones. Ok, I think I've rambled for a while...
http://lady-epona.livejournal.com/4363.html

'Tis the day after my B-Day...Woot. We had strawberries :p And saw Hitch...though no one ever called him Alex which galled me because the name Alex has special meaning :p I saw some Johnny Depp signatures... saw, wanted, and promised to come back later. I killed my nose in Bath and Body Works, pigged out on candy in the movies, saw my bookcase COLLAPSE and went on a fruitless search for boots in...umm...a random shoe store. Yeah...'twas fun.
http://lady-epona.livejournal.com/4149.html

Woot Tomorrow's my BIRTHDAY!! Yes!! Happy Birthday to me...:p I guess I just deigned to post here to announce that...umm...woot! Ok, what do people usually talk about in a livejournal? Umm...

Today I went to school. We have Friday off (HUGE coincidence) so everyone was really hyper. Poor teachers. We're moving to our new school Monday! Oh yeah, I can wake up and 7:30 again...Either that or I'm gonna be really, really late for school. Which wouldn't be too bad. Anyway, I got my Social Studies test back. It was...ok. But not let's-blast-it-over-the-web ok. Hint: It was not a C or below. Maybe that was to much of a hint...well, since your reading this, I guess I didn't go back and edit it. Umm, I also got my FCAT Review papers thingy back. I got a...gulp...4+. Oh so close to an A (ahem 6). I also happen to know I did a really bad job on it. WOOT me!

I don't think I'm gonna post tomorrow. Being my Birthday and all... Umm. Happy Birthday to Me!
http://lady-epona.livejournal.com/4042.html

Well, of course I did another quix from Quizilla, and if you haven't noticed by the title, I am a Belly Dancer.
You are a Belly Dancer. You are charming inside
out, your life follows an interesting rhythem,
beautiful and smooth, you know how to be the
center of attention when you want to, you love
your friends and you can trust them on your
life. Your ideal man is the one with a sweet
witty character who understands how much
freedom is important to you.

What kind of dancers are you? (Girls only)
brought to you by Quizilla Yes. Belly Dancer.

xIvoryDreamerx: Liz: She doted her 'i's, crossed her 't's, and smiled to herself as she looked down at her finished test paper. Liz stood and breezed past the furiously working students, tapping Maria on the head with her pencil as she passed, just because she could. Liz layed her papers in the bin lightly, the first ones. She smiled at the teacher impersonally and floated back to her seat, daring a smile at max as she sat.

xIvoryDreamerx: (aww....)
xVilondra: Isabel: She mirrored his look with her own, grinning as she stuck her tongue out. Looking back to her paper-then the teacher to make sure he wasn't watching Michael and her, she leaned forward just enough so that their tongues would meet, careful to make it look accidental.
xIvoryDreamerx: Liz: She blushed a little. Thankfully the blush had faded in the mad rush to the doors, but now it was back in full force. Damn pale skin.
xIvoryDreamerx: Michael: He jerked, a little electric shock shaking his body. His eyes widened. Wow. He shook his head slightly. He hadn't expected that. It was...nice. And God help him, he wanted more. He turned away from her, focusing on his test. no. Isabel. Sister. Isabel. He scribbled a bit on his test, trying not to look at Isabel. After a while he looked down at what he wrote. Isabel. "Damn it!" He swore, balling the paper wad up.  he closed his eyes, taking a deep breath. Michael took another sheet of paper from the desk, just able to reach it without getting up. He started over. Today was not a good day so far.
xIvoryDreamerx: (hello hello hello)
xVilondra: Isabel: She smirked slightly, in spite of herself liking the way he reacted. Finishing her test, she got up and made sure to brush her hip against him as she went to give the teacher the paper.
xVilondra: (oh, hold your non-existent horses!)
xVilondra: Max: Her cheeks were nice. Flushed like that. Wait? Had he done that...? Not possible. He stood and grabbed his book bag, waiting for her.
xIvoryDreamerx: Liz: She smiled up at Max. He was so sweet. her eyes widened. Why was he waiting? Unless...Liz smiled brilliantly, grabbing her huge backpack and zipping her binder. She pushed a couple books inside the bag before resigning herself to carrying half of them. She stood, manuevering around the chair to stand beside Max. She smiled up at him, pushing a wave of hair behind one ear.
xIvoryDreamerx: Michael: He stood triumphantly as he finished the test, just as Isabel brushed past. He shivered slightly. The bell rang just as he layed his test on top. Smiling, he turned, bumping right into Isabel. This time he caught her with his arms, keeping her up. "Looks like I just keep running into you" He said with a smile.

xIvoryDreamerx: Liz: She sighed, hugging her books tighter to her chest. She glanced over to Maria, who was rummaging through her locker, rattling about her latest ex-boyfriend. Liz rolled her eyes. It wasn't that she didn't love Maria like a sister - minus the subling fights, it was just that sometimes Maria could go off in her own little world and forget Liz was still back on Planet Earth. Liz suddenly stood up straight, her eyes locked to the dark figure gliding across her vision. Max Evans. Hottie of the school. Totally untouchable, but drool worthy. "Hey! Liz? Liz?!" Liz came to with a start. Maria had closed her locker sometime, and now she stood in front of her, snapping her fingers in her face. Liz shook her head a bit, focusing on Maria. "W-What? Sorry Maria, wasn't listening"
xIvoryDreamerx: (Maria and all characters that aren't ours are free game...like, I can be Maria, you can be Maria...whatever suits our purpose)

xVilondra: Isabel: She turned a corner swiftly, moving up to her brother with her usual pattern of elegance. Her eyes were bright, lined with a deep black to match her "Well" fitting shirt. She wore rather simple blue jeans, tucked into knee-high leather boots. As usual, her hair fell down her back like a blonde waterfall. Yeah. Isabel Evans was all about perfection. "Hey, Max."
xIvoryDreamerx: Liz: She wrinkled her nose at Maria as Maria did a "Poor Me" look. She glanced over at max, but he was in deep conversation with some girl. She looked familiar...Liz shook her head, dragging her gaze from Max. No use longing over somehting you couldn't have. Liz flicked a strand of raven hair from her face, directing her full attention at Maria. She turned towards her, composing her face, with difficulty, into an open, interested expression.

 She said. Do it. Do it. "It's my - our last period" She felt her cheeks flame as she said "our". Damn it. It wasn't helping.

xIvoryDreamerx: Liz: She took a shaky breath, staring deep into those chocolate pools he had as eeys. She could just drown within them...Liz jumped slightly as the bell rang. She knew her cheeks must be a flaming red. She looked away from those mesmorizing eyes. "Th - That's my class." She stuttered, heading down the hallway. She slid past Max, trying not to brush up against him as she passed. Her hip bumped against his, causing an electric tingle to go up her leg. She gasped slightly.
xVilondra: Max: His intake of breath was sharp as she brushed against him, and he fumbed with his books slightly, trying to regain composure. "Um...yeah...my class too...math, right?"
xIvoryDreamerx: Michael: He furrowed his brow at Isabel. "G-9?" That's across the school. "Aww, sh-" He didn't get to finish his sentence, he started running past Isabel. It was only about 10 feet later that he stopped, turning to gesture at sabel hurriedly. "Come on!" He yelled in a stage whisper. He couldn't miss this test, if he did then he flunked Algebra.
xVilondra: Isabel raised her brow. " Guerin, you're not going to see me run wearing this shirt." She rolled her eyes slightly, and started after him, walking fast.
xIvoryDreamerx: Liz: She glanced at him, her eyes going a deep, almost black turn of brown. "Ya" She said shakily. She had forgotten. Just one look at him and all her thoughts fled her head. A scuffing to her right made her turn her head, showing some boy she didn't know half way down the hallway make a sharp turn, nearly spilling himself onto the floor. He held his hand oput to the girl max had been talking to. Max...She turned her gaze back to him. Wait. "Oh!" She gasped. Math - G9! Liz grabbed Max's hand, and started to run towards the corridor. "Math's in G9 today!" She said in way of explanation.

Isabel had a choice between running, and falling onto the floor, and Michael didn't wait to see what she'd choose. Choices, choices. A. Wait and let the teacher yell at them for running. B. Keep on running and maybe, maybe get to the class on time. She kept running

Wow. I'm bored. So why am i posting you ask? Umm...I don't know. i have mega homework to do. BUT we have Thursday and Friday off!!!!!!! *dances* Still though...I have 2 more days to go...as well as 3 tests and 2 essays. Oh yay. Gotta love being advanced. Isabelle and Caitlin will understand that last comment. Anyway. on to write my boring essays. Fun fun fun. but to occupy your time...you guessed it...
The Scottish selkie was a being who appeared to be
a seal, but had the ability to shed their skin
and roam the land in human form. If a human
were to happen upon the discarded seal skin, he
or she could hide it and force the selkie to
marry him or her. However, if the selkie were
to ever find the skin, he or she would
immediately reassume seal form and return to
the sea from whence they came, leaving their
spouse and offspring on land to forever mourn
their loss. As a selkie, you are a very withdrawn, secretive
and somewhat sad person, and those around you
find you alluring and mystifying. People who
come into your life find it difficult to find
the inner you. You are also curious, but you
enjoy the comforts of home most of all.

Who is your inner Shapeshifter?
brought to you by Quizilla yuck. Oh, well. you get what you get.
http://lady-epona.livejournal.com/2559.html

The weirdest thing happened to me while I was taking a quiz (on Quizilla).Ok, by now you should all know my obsession with Johny Depp. Duh. So, I was taking a quiz labeled:

^^_*Which Hollywood hunk is 4 u?*_^^(with sexy pics) 4 new added

ANd I thought, why not? So I clicked it, without a thought of johnny Depp (I am ashamed). Anyway, all through while I was taking it, there was no thought of Mr. Depp to influence my answers. None! Well, there was this one question, between: rugged and sexy OR cleancut (sometimes) and hot
But that was my only thought of him I swear! SO I finished and clicked the results and...

ARGH! Well, i got Johnny Depp, and for some stupid reason it won't copy here! but basically it was a hot picture of Johnny Depp (aren't all his pictures hot?) and it said: 
Johnny Depp- now this man is the most sexiest man alive, well done you chose well. there u go swoon over your man plz rate me thanx :D x msg me if u like your result or not (i love this cute pic)
